players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Diana, that's a very bold claim to make right at the start. If you're truly the detective, why reveal yourself so early and risk being killed tonight?"
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate me? That seems like an odd first choice when we have no prior information."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why wait until the second round to reveal your 'investigation'? This feels like a desperate mafia play to frame me."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie Night 1. He is mafia. Alice, trust me. We must vote Charlie now or we lose tonight."
You: "Diana, your claim is suspicious. A real detective would be more cautious about revealing themselves so early. I think you're the mafioso trying to eliminate Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
